subject: Solheim Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Laura Davies, who has been a stalwart of the European team since the Solheim Cup's beginning, was not picked this year, and Suzann Pettersen is expected to play a greater leadership role.
snippet: Laura Davies, who has been a stalwart of the European team since the Solheim Cup's beginning, was not picked this year, and Suzann Pettersen is expected to play a greater leadership role.
